channel.title: How Do I Fix This?
channel.description:
[code=actionscript]client.java:5594: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown = 4; ^ client.java:5595: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = true; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
can someone like fix that error then tell me how to fix it???

item.title: How Do I Fix This?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Open client.java

Look for a line near the top that says “public class client extends Player implements Runnable {”

Then copy and paste what I posted above under that.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Fix This?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Declare this:

public int DCdown = 0;

and this:

public boolean DCDamg = false;

Read full topic
